2114.subject: ISSM
2114.descrlong: The purpose of this course is to survey four specific areas of World Mythology and the general world of global mythologies.  The following areas will be the foci of this learning experience: Hindu Mythology, Norse Mythology, Celtic Myths and Legends, and American Indian Myths and Legends.  We will also examine some of the history of the scholarly theory surrounding the origin, purpose, and comparison of mythic literature around the world.
